text.textblock: Project Decommissioning at Relicensing; Extension of Time for Reply Comments

action.textblock: Notice of inquiry; extension of time for reply comments.

summary.textblock: On September 15, 1993, the Commission issued a notice of inquiry on a series of related questions that involve the decommissioning of licensed hydropower projects after the original license for the project has expired (58 FR 48991, September 21, 1993). The date for filing reply comments is being extended at the request of an interested commenter.

date.textblock: The date for filing reply comments is extended to and including March 7, 1994.

address.textblock: Office of the Secretary, Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, 825 North Capitol Street, NE., Washington, DC 20426.
